statements: SELECT * FROM iris_scans;
SELECT id, person_id FROM iris_scans ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT person_id, id FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, person_id, LENGTH(iris_data) AS data_length FROM iris_scans ORDER BY data_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT id, person_id FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id = 3 AND id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, LENGTH(iris_data) AS data_length FROM iris_scans WHERE id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY data_length DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT person_id FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY person_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM individuals;
SELECT id, name FROM individuals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, gender FROM individuals WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT individual_id, scan_result FROM iris_scans WHERE scan_result = 'Match';
SELECT * FROM individuals WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, gender FROM individuals WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, gender FROM individuals WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 18;
SELECT iris_scan FROM individuals WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';

SELECT iris_scans.scan_id, individuals.name, iris_scans.scan_date FROM iris_scans INNER JOIN individuals ON iris_scans.individual_id = individuals.id WHERE scan_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans;
SELECT person_id, iris_scan_data FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM individuals ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT person_id_a, person_id_b, match_similarity FROM iris_match WHERE match_similarity > 0.6;
SELECT person_id_a, person_id_b, match_similarity FROM iris_match WHERE person_id_a = 2 AND person_id_b = 3;
SELECT * FROM individuals WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM individuals WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY first_name DESC
SELECT person_id, iris_scan_data FROM iris_scans WHERE person_id = 3
SELECT person_id_a, person_id_b, match_similarity FROM iris_match WHERE match_similarity > 0.8 ORDER BY match_id DESC
SELECT * FROM iris_scans JOIN individuals ON iris_scans.person_id = individuals.person_id
SELECT * FROM individuals;
SELECT individual_id, iris_scan_data FROM individuals WHERE individual_id = 1;
SELECT scan_id, individual_id, scan_date, scan_results FROM iris_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT permission_id, individual_id, scan_id, permission_level FROM permissions WHERE permission_level > 1;
SELECT log_id, individual_id, scan_id, access_result FROM access_logs WHERE access_result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM individuals ORDER BY individual_id DESC;
SELECT iris_scan_data FROM individuals WHERE individual_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE scan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT scan_id, COUNT(*) FROM permissions GROUP BY scan_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT log_id, individual_id, scan_id FROM access_logs WHERE access_result = TRUE ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans;
SELECT person_id, iris_data FROM iris_scans ORDER BY person_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM persons WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT person_id, access_level FROM permissions INNER JOIN persons ON permissions.person_id = persons.person_id WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans LIMIT 10;
SELECT person_id, full_name FROM persons WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT permission_id, access_level, p.full_name FROM permissions JOIN persons p ON permissions.person_id = p.person_id WHERE access_level >= 3;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, full_name FROM access_logs JOIN persons ON access_logs.person_id = persons.person_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT s.camera_id, s.location, p.full_name FROM security_cameras s JOIN persons p ON s.person_id = p.person_id WHERE location = 'Main Entrance';
